text: let's look at other uses of scene
we can you seem with a that Clause the
expression it seems that is used to
describe a situation or condition that
appears to exist or be true example it
seems that many people ask Ken for his
advice he's very knowledgeable and he's
always ready to help note that we can
drop that scene plus like plus a noun
clause and seem plus as if plus a noun
clause these structures are used to
describe a situation or condition that
appears to exist or be true note that
like is more conversational in fact some
sources see this use of like as
non-standard English but it is very
common especially in conversation
example it seems like ken can do no
wrong everyone loves them but you you
seem like you have something against him
in other words it seems as if Ken can do
no wrong everyone loves them but you you
seem as if you have something against
him so this variation with as if is
slightly more formal than the variation
would like but they have the same
meaning
it's also possible to say the following
it seems Ken can do no wrong everyone
loves them but you you seem to have
something against him the meaning is
basically the same
however this variation suggests more
certainty or greater likelihood that the
statement is true seem plus like plus a
noun phrase we use this to describe how
someone or something gives the
appearance or impression of having a
certain quality there is the possibility
that it is the wrong impression example
thank you for your advice that seems
like a good idea
the same structure has another meaning a
different use we can use it to describe
how a situation is similar to another
time or place example when did you meet
Ken back in high school
wow that long ago yeah but it seems like
yesterday exercise to choose the correct
phrase to complete the statement example
Frank didn't come into work today
that's strange because he seemed or

statements with your own ideas
one one old song that I love is whenever
I hear it it seems as if I haven't grown
any older since the first time I heard
it the song makes me feel like a kid
again too when you look at famous people
such as they seem to have everything a
person could want in life that can't be
true though no one is completely happy
three it seems that most people my age

understand the meaning of the words in
bold one I can't seem to learn the new
software and the computers at work I've
tried and tried and makes no sense I
can't seem to learn means a it appears
that I am learning B it appears that I
